title: Isn't it lovely?...animu/waifu thread
body:
Ok yeah i know i haven't been posting enough lately but i have a valid reason so hear me out

http://i.imgur.com/LBuN2co.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/s52Khpz.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/c4dZsav.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/6QzEzR7.png

http://i.imgur.com/k690GrM.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/93Gyi2M.jpg

Honestly i don't know what the reason is but i think it was something important or maybe not? how am i  supposed to know

http://i.imgur.com/zDONWMV.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/aipDrfI.png

http://i.imgur.com/xaEeK2U.png

http://i.imgur.com/jZEbwOe.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/REfuuCX.jpg


Aight so this year, this lovely year we are getting some nice stuff like No Game No Life movie, Yuki Yuna is a Hero movies, Overlord 2nd season and well AoT 2nd season that one is not important tho

http://i.imgur.com/ApkBx8H.png

http://i.imgur.com/IvIyTWx.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/KZD5kH1.png

http://i.imgur.com/EtSJ0b8.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/2XMOk5Y.jpg

Puella Magi Madoka Magica is getting a mobile game, im sure i posted the game trailer a few days ago hmmm 4 days i think but yeah that just tells me that Madoka is not dead and that is nice

http://i.imgur.com/wLE6hmK.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/9UGcsBM.png

http://i.imgur.com/RUjR94K.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/D4FcVCP.png

http://i.imgur.com/DrOtkMf.png

I've managed to finish Monogatari Series Second season and i must say that i liked all the Nadeko Medusa arc, it was interesting also finished Hanamonogatari and lets be honest, long haired Araragi is shit

http://i.imgur.com/SfBRo31.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/D2plMn6.png

http://i.imgur.com/eLhNV22.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/urtjeOk.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/P2BmjZN.png

and Rouka was a nice character but so far including Monogatari Series i think that Kaiki is a great character, the only thing that i hate about every single monogatari animu is that after it finishes it leaves you that disgusting sense of void, i really hate that

http://i.imgur.com/5WTPTT3.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/BpvoYHi.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/spsj84h.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/WDtNtr9.jpg

Also im sexy af, cheers

http://i.imgur.com/NPS3dQm.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/QNPiIfL.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/IwEYN8b.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/dwFQoXV.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/KwEHYHr.jpg

Now about music, i've been searching for more weeb music that isnt just tofu or that to make this better but there is still going to be tofu music so dw

Not today tho, today its the same stuff or something like that :^)
